ygData.subject: vampiric embrace
ygData.msgSnippet: 12 hp every once in a while may not seem like much. but it does increase over time. besides, how many people have a buff that lets them to drain life? the
ygData.messageBody:
12 hp every once in a while may not seem like much. but it does increase
over time. besides, how many people have a buff that lets them to drain
life? the trick is getting to lvl 30. if you can do that, the shadow knight
has become an immensely powerful class by that time and quite playable. that
is why verant doesnt want to give us a great amount of power at low levels..
we'd be strong ALL the way through.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
